assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Media Links Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets various technology solutions for broadcast industry in Japan and internationally. The company offers Element Management System ProMD, a real time monitoring and troubleshooting network elements for media networks. It also provides media over IP transport solutions to broadcasters, telecoms, and network providers. In addition, it provides IP video router/switch systems; IP media gateway; and NetGazer, a network management software, as well as manufactures transmission equipment. Further, the company provides web production; editing studio rental; and e-learning system construction and operation support services. The company was formerly known as Media Global Links Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Media Links Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Media Links Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.
